system.descriptionText: If Comrade is in Cohesion, Prior to beginning an Encounter add +2 to Initative. On the first round of combat, each enemy with a lower Initiative roll than the Character's counts as being Unaware (+30 to hit). Can't issue order during combat after Initiative has been rolled.

description.value: If Comrade is in Cohesion, Prior to beginning an Encounter add +2 to Initative. On the first round of combat, each enemy with a lower Initiative roll than the Character's counts as being Unaware (+30 to hit). Can't issue order during combat after Initiative has been rolled.
